# conjur Provider

Fetch secrets and manage CyberArk Secrets Manager resources.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    conjur = {
      source  = "terraform.example.com/cyberark/conjur"
    }
  }
}

provider "conjur" {
  appliance_url = var.conjur_appliance_url
  account       = var.conjur_account
  authn_type    = var.conjur_authn_type
  login         = var.conjur_authn_login
  api_key       = var.conjur_api_key
  ssl_cert      = var.conjur_ssl_cert
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `account` (String) Conjur account
- `api_key` (String) Conjur API key
- `appliance_url` (String) Conjur endpoint URL
- `authn_jwt_token` (String) Authn JWT Token
- `authn_type` (String) Conjur Authentication Type
- `client_id` (String) Azure client id for user assigned managed identity
- `host_id` (String) Conjur host id
- `login` (String) Conjur login
- `service_id` (String) Conjur service id
- `ssl_cert` (String) Content of Conjur public SSL certificate
- `ssl_cert_path` (String) Path to Conjur public SSL certificate
